observation: NuFi | Store, manage and stake cryptocurrencies and digital assets.  nufi logo Features Roadmap Blockchains FAQ Support discord twitter Menu Meet NuFi: Non-custodial Send, Receive and Stake Multi-chain NFT gallery Install Browser Extension Connect to Dapps with Open Web Wallet Start now Learn more NuFi Wallet Features: Multi-chain portfolio Manage your assets and accounts on different blockchains together. Multi-chain staking Stake crypto, earn crypto while you sleep. Learn more about staking here Manage your NFTs on different blockchains together in one gallery. Stress-free seedless signup Log in with a social account like Google to have a non-custodial wallet created for you with no seed phrase to store. Connect to Web3 Dapps Connect to Dapps like NFT marketplaces, DEXes, DeFi, Metaverses and more on different chains at the same time. Compatible with all Dapps Connect to Dapps even if they don't support NuFi wallet directly thanks to Wallet Emulation mode. Buy and trade 400+ assets Integrated crypto exchange and option to buy crypto with card. Integrated Cardano DEX Swap tokens on the Cardano blockchain directly in your wallet. Effortless Migration Import your existing crypto wallet in under 30 seconds. Learn more Hardware wallet compatible Connect your hardware wallet to manage its accounts through NuFi wallet’s interface (with functionality not offered by Ledger Live or Trezor Suite). Our non-custodial guarantee Complete control and full ownership of your digital assets, with no middleman, no restrictions and total privacy. Learn more about NuFi on our blog Subscribe to updates Request a feature Launch & Q1 2022 Cardano blockchain support Cardano NFT gallery Staking dashboard In-app cross-chain trading Hardware-wallet-only mode Export wallet history (Cardano) Q2, 2022 Flow staking Flow NFT gallery Cardano DEX integration Solana NFT gallery Cardano dApp connector Buy and sell cryptocurrencies Solana dApp connector Flow dApp connector Privacy mode Profile sync across devices ADA Handle integration Improved assets dashboard Improved NFT gallery design Ethereum blockchain integration Ethereum dApp connector Ethereum NFT gallery ENS support Q1, 2023 Milkomeda blockchain integration Milkomeda C1 Dapp connector Support for .find names Improved browser extension UI 2023 Governance token More PoS blockchains Option to add any EVM blockchain Ethereum staking Catalyst 2.0 implementation Supported Blockchains and Staking Information What is staking? APY Accounts Supported Cardano 3.5-4.5% Non-hardware Ledger Trezor Rewards re-staked automatically Start Staking Solana 6-7% Flow 8-9% Rewards re-staked manually (once a week) Ethereum - Milkomeda C1 Polygon NuFi supports all cryptocurrencies and NFTs that use these blockchains. Start stake More protocols coming soon We’re proud of our Customer Support, Knowledge Base and Community. Dedicated Support Team Submit a ticket here Extensive Knowledge Base See how NuFi works here Round-the-clock Advice Ask questions on Discord here FAQ’s It says that NuFi is compatible with all decentralized applications (Dapps); how does that work? You can use NuFi with decentralized applications (Dapps) on all 5 supported blockchains. What’s more, NuFi is compatible with all Cardano, Ethereum, Milkomeda C1 and Solana Dapps thanks to Wallet Emulation mode, which lets NuFi connect in place of popular wallets (as long as these wallet extensions are disabled). This makes NuFi instantly usable with all your favourite Dapps. Try it yourself (after installing NuFi): disable MetaMask, then go to NFT marketplace OpenSea.io I've read that NuFi is non-custodial. What does that mean? Non-custodial means that you alone control your wallet’s private keys, giving you (and only you) unconditional ownership and control of your assets at all times. With a non-custodial wallet like NuFi, there’s no middleman who could restrict access to your wallet or the crypto stored in it. I want to stake my crypto but I'm worried about losing access to my funds; can I unstake and transfer my crypto whenever I want? Yes! Your crypto can be unstaked and transferred at any time. When you stake your crypto, your funds never leave your wallet and you don’t transfer ownership of your crypto to anyone. Some blockchains (such as Solana) impose a short ‘cooldown’ period after unstaking, meaning you may need to wait a couple of days for the blockchain to close your staking account and make your funds available to transfer. Other blockchains (such as Cardano) don’t lock funds while they’re staked, meaning you can transfer funds out of your wallet at any time without needing to unstake them first. I already have a wallet; if I migrate it to NuFi, will my wallet’s balance, receiving address and staking setup be the same? Yes! If you already have a non-custodial wallet (e.g. AdaLite, Eternl, MetaMask, or Phantom), you can use your existing seed phrase to migrate your wallet to NuFi. When you do that, you’ll see that your wallet’s receiving address(es), assets, transaction history and staking setup are exactly the same with no further action needed. Can I store NFTs in my NuFi wallet? Can I transfer them too? Yes! Your NuFi wallet lets you securely store, manage and bulk-send multiple NFTs on all supported blockchains. What’s more, NuFi’s in-app NFT gallery brings your collections to life by visually displaying your NFTs side by side. medium reddit github © 2023 NuFi All rights reserved NuFi AG, Arbachstrasse 60B, 6340 Baar, Switzerland Create a new wallet I am subscribing to product updates. Subscribe Read more in our Privacy Policy Powered by Vacuumlabs Terms & Conditions Contact Us: contact@nu.fi trustpilot

thought: The website does not display any unusually low prices or claims of free. It also does not claim to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. However, there is no information about the company's physical address, and the website does not seem to handle different products from common e-commerce websites. I should also retrieve WHOIS information to check the domain name.
